name: Golden Boy
description:
Some people lose their composure when they see gold. The boy who suffers from the gold rush will not give up on anything. All gold, his own or someone else's, he will take by force. Loot gold from monsters? Yes Easy!

Golden Boy is a 2D platformer packed with monsters and everyone's favorite gold. You need to help the boy collect all the gold in the levels, as well as get rid of annoying bubbles and bats. Sleight of hand and more!

Features of the game:

- Beautiful Pixel Art
- Nice musical accompaniment
- Variety of levels
- Complexity
